question: Write a letter to your local council about the state of the sport club facilities and request more facilities suitable for people of your age.- Describe your sport club facilities.- What facilities are required?- Explain why people of your age need these facilities.
text: I am writing a letter regarding adding extra benefits  to  the sports stadium.

I would like to inform you that nowadays people can enjoy different activities in the club in which children can play soccer and  tennis. In addition, there is  space for the teenagers to  do swimming every day.
I would greatly appreciate it if you could open a small gym for  people who are mature . Moreover, I would be thankful if you can make  proper pavement around the ground for a walk.

We are looking for these benefits because it is difficult for us to play soccer at this age.However, to stay healthy we need to do some workouts. Thus, we are looking for gym facilities in our sports club . Furthermore, If there is proper pavement then mature citizens can easily do a jog.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
